categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starfighter squadrons

nodes.text: Vortex Squadron was a Rebel Alliance T-47 sandspeeder unit led by Harl Bess and stationed at the Arda I Rebel base. It was in operation by the time of the Battle of the Gauntlet in 0 ABY, and the sandspeeders were used to mainly conducted patrol operations around the base.
Vortex Squadron appears in Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game adventure Onslaught at Arda I.
